metadata.title: CVE-2014-8321 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the gps_tracker function in airodump-ng.c inAircrack-ng before 1.2 RC 1 allows local users to execute arbitrary code orgain privileges via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: aircrack-ng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
